sentence:
• QUALCOMM Incorporated's QCOM shares jumped 4% after the company said that it would buy back shares worth $16 billion
• Shares of HollyFrontier Corporation HFC gained 2% after the company's board authorized a $1 billion share buyback program
• Tilray, Inc.'s TLRY shares jumped 14.1 % after the company said that it had received necessary regulatory permits in Germany and Canada to export medical cannabis flowers
• Shares of The Home Depot, Inc. HD declined 1.2% after Hurricane Florence, which began lashing costal North Carolina, was downgraded to Category 2
